title: Appeals to the Rent Board
description: Appeals are filed when parties are seeking review of decisions made by the Rent Board. Appeals are decided by the Rent Board Commission. Grounds for appeal include: substantive appeals, procedural problems and hardship appeals. For more information, please see: https://www.sf.gov/appeal-decision-rent-board

columns.name: Filing Party
columns.description: Appeal filed by landlord or tenant

columns.name: Appeal ID
columns.description: Case number assigned to all appeals filed with the Rent Board

columns.name: Hardship Appeal
columns.description: Indicates the appeal was filed on the basis of financial hardship

columns.name: Interpreter Request
columns.description: Indicates an interpreter was requested by the party

columns.name: Appeal Source Zipcode
columns.description: The zipcode entered into the system of record (as opposed to computed from the latitude/longitude)

columns.name: Supervisor District
columns.description:
District Number - San Francisco Board of Supervisors (1 to 11).

Please note these are automatically assigned based on the latitude and longitude. These will be blank if the automated geocoding was unsuccessful.

columns.name: shape
columns.description: Location as point in WKT OGC format, e.g., POINT(-122.3,37.4)

columns.name: data_as_of
columns.description: Timestamp the data was updated in the source system

columns.name: data_loaded_at
columns.description: Timestamp the data was loaded to the open data portal

columns.name: SF Find Neighborhoods 2
columns.description: This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'SF Find Neighborhoods' (6qbp-sg9q) the point in column 'shape' is located.  This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.

columns.name: Current Police Districts 2
columns.description: This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'Current Police Districts' (qgnn-b9vv) the point in column 'shape' is located.  This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.

whom_it_may_interest: Research organizations, landlords, tenants, local government bodies

queries.Monthly: SELECT date_trunc_ym(date_filed) AS month, COUNT(*) AS total_appeals, supervisor_district, filing_party, hardship_appeal WHERE date_filed>='2022-09-01' GROUP BY supervisor_district, filing_party, hardship_appeal, month
queries.Yearly: SELECT date_trunc_y(date_filed) AS year, COUNT(*) AS total_appeals, supervisor_district, filing_party, hardship_appeal WHERE date_filed>='2022-09-01' GROUP BY supervisor_district, filing_party, hardship_appeal, year
